BiblioEntry.Abstract: The paper introduces a fuzzy automaton where internal state is n-tuple of fuzzy sets. Each fuzzy set records the difference between expected and actual input. This enables adaptation to variations between processed unknown patternand template. Some experiments and results of utilizing the proposed automaton in handwritten character recognition problem are presented.

BiblioSet.TitleISBD: The International NAISO Congress on Information Science Innovation (ISI2001), March 17-21, 2001 at the American University in Dubai, U.A.E. in co-operation with Dubai Internet City [Elektronski vir] / editor Milad Farres Sebaaly

BiblioEntry.Abstract: In our paper we present a structure of fuzzy cellular automata (FCA). First ofall we have to complete the definition of fuzzy automation for the needs of FCA definition. The fuzzy automation is used as an abstract model of the main FCA enity, which is called a cell. Introducing fuzzy logic into the cellular automata filed enables us to study fuzziness of tume, fuzzines of defining neighbour cells and fuzzines of the cellćs (automationćs) state. As the end ofour paper we also present the usage of FCA structure through an application case of fire spread in natural environment. Wut the fire spread into fuzzy rules.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: In our study we tried to elucidate the relationship between the changing compliance of the left ventricle and the tone of the autonomic nervous system (ANS). ANS activity was determined by spectral analysis (SA) of R-R interval variability (FFT). The 2-D guided M-mode echocardiogram was performed in orderto measure dimensions of the left ventricle. Pulsed wave Doppler was usedto obtain peak velocity flow through the mitral valve (i.e. E and A wave).SA showed a significantly lower value of HFžLF area ratio in hpertensivepatients (p=0.01). 26.2% of hypertensive patients had a significantly lower value of this ratio, 39.7% had significantly lower value of E/A ratio, and 12.5% had at the same time significantly lower E/A and HF/LF.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Primerjave merilne metode TMG z dobro preizkušenimi metodami kažejo povezavo med različnimi parametri odziva in drugimi merilnimi metodami. Pri hotenem enakomernem povečanju sile je povezava med odmikom trebuha mišic in efektivno vrednostjo EMG linearna, naklon prilegane premice pa se z utrujenostjo spreminja. Pri konstantni obremenitvi mišice je povezava med odmikom trebuha mišice in efektivno vrednostjo EMG pri različnih obremenitvah eksponentna.
